name: openrouter_validator
description: A tool for systematically testing and evaluating OpenRouter.ai providers with a focus on tool use capabilities

credentials.description: OpenRouter API key required for testing providers

skills.name: Provider Management
skills.description: Configure and manage OpenRouter provider definitions for testing

examples.output: Here are the currently configured providers: anthropic, openai, meta, google (disabled)
examples.description: Lists all configured providers with their status

examples.input: Add a new provider named 'cohere' with model 'cohere/command-r'
examples.output: Successfully added the provider 'cohere' with model 'cohere/command-r'. It is now enabled for testing.

skills.name: Test Execution
skills.description: Execute tests against OpenRouter providers and collect results

examples.input: Run a test for the 'anthropic' provider using prompt 'tool_basic'
examples.output: Test completed for anthropic/claude-3.7-sonnet with prompt 'tool_basic'. The test was successful.
examples.description: Executes a single test with a specific provider and prompt

examples.input: Generate a summary report for all test results
examples.output: Report generated and saved as 'summary_20250731_123045.md'. Overall success rate across all providers is 87.5%.
examples.description: Creates a comprehensive summary report of all test results

skills.name: Error Analysis
skills.description: Analyze and categorize errors encountered during provider testing

examples.output:
Error analysis for openai/gpt-4o:
- 60% rate_limit errors
- 30% timeout errors
- 10% tool_format errors
Most errors occurred with the 'openai' provider.
examples.description: Analyzes error patterns for a specific model
